snippet: Fathers are doing more of the family shopping just as girls are being steered toward toys that develop math skills.
abstract: Toy companies Mattel and Lego are introducing construction sets designed for girls in order to appeal to fathers who are increasingly doing more of the family shopping; major shift in marketplace is having consequence beyond toys, as brands and stores begin catering directly to male decision-makers.
lead_paragraph: Fathers are doing more of the family shopping just as girls are being steered toward toys that develop math skills.

headline.seo: More Dads Buy the Toys, So Barbie, and Stores, Get Makeovers
